comments:
3.1RC1 

I was checking out some source from CVS in the background and edited a working
set from within the JDT Package Explorer. Then I deselected the active working
set. I got an error dialog that notified me about the error. After confirming
this dialog with "OK" the workbench terminated.

Created an attachment (id=22601)
VM Crash log

U:\>java -version
java version "1.5.0_02"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_02-b09)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_02-b09, mixed mode, sharing)

The definition of ArrayStoreException is:

"Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to store the wrong type of
object into an array of objects."

This is impossible with the SWT code of Menu.getItems().

The only way this could have happened is if your environment was corrupted by
something such as a memory trampler.
